National Sentence Text: In an assembly occupancy, the number of spaces designated for wheelchair use within rooms or areas with fixed seats shall conform to Table 3.8.2.3. (See also Article 3.8.3.21. for additional requirements.)

P/T Sentence Text: Unless a barrier-free path of travel is not required in an assembly occupancy by Sentence 3.8.2.3.(2), the number of spaces designated for use by persons using wheelchairs within rooms or areas with fixed seats shall conform to Table 3.8.2.3. and be dispersed in each floor level of seating, in each price range of seating, and in each viewing section of seating.

(See Article 3.8.3.21. for the design requirements.)
